resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Copy from REST connector into ADLS Gen2')]

activities.name: GetBearerToken
activities.description: Use this Web activity to get bearer token

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
ItemName + 'xxx' as Item from
[dbo].[srcTableA]
where cost > @{pipeline().parameters.cost}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select  
[ItemName],
[ItemSkew],
12 as cost
from [dbo].[srcTableA]
where ItemName = 'Comic2'
